item.title: How to configure LB-LINK
item.description: Overview Do you want to change WiFi to regular cable connection. Or you need cheap WiFI amplifier? This post is for you! You can by LB-LINK BL-MP01 for only 13$ (52 PLN). It is really cheap and it does it work. Repeater (client mode) If you want to change WiFi to regular cable connection you need to switch device to Repeater mode. Connect power and Ethernet cable. Make sure power mode is on.
